executable.cmd: ros2 run rmf_demos_tasks dispatch_patrol -p start_A goal_A -F tinyRobot -R tinyRobotA -n 500 --use_sim_time
ros2 run rmf_demos_tasks dispatch_patrol -p start_B goal_B -F tinyRobot -R tinyRobotB -n 500 --use_sim_time
ros2 run rmf_demos_tasks dispatch_patrol -p start_C goal_C -F tinyRobot -R tinyRobotC -n 500 --use_sim_time
ros2 run rmf_demos_tasks dispatch_patrol -p start_D goal_D -F tinyRobot -R tinyRobotD -n 500 --use_sim_time
